string.value: Despite defeating 10 #o5120503# just as #b#p2091000##k ordered, he had that look of "that's really nothing". What? Okay, that's really not cool. I better go see #p2091000# again.
Without any explanation, #p2091000# ordered to me to take on #r20 #o5120503#s#k. \n\n#o5120503# #r#a38011##k
Even though I was successful in taking on all the #o5120503#s, #p2091000# compliment my work one bit. He's really getting on my nerves now...
수련에만 정신을 집중해도 강해지기는 쉽지 않아. 모든 마음을 모아 수행, 또 수행하게나.\r\n#L0# #b…저어, 이제 선인으로 만들어 주실 겁니까?
흠? 자넨 누구지? 이 수련장 소속은 아닌 것 같은데?\r\n#L0# #b전에 선인이 되고 싶다고 말씀드렸던 사람입니다! #o5120503#도 10마리 잡았습니다!
아아~ 그러고 보니 그런 일이 있었던 것 같기도 하군. 아직도선인이 되고 싶은가?
그럼 당장 나가서 #o5120503# 20마리를 쓰러뜨리게. 뭘 망설이고 있어? 어서 잡게!
되고 싶은 생각이 없다면 수련을 방해하지 말게. 선인이 되기 위해서는 부지런히 수련을 해야 한다고.

It's not easy to improve yourself just by concentrating on training. You'll need to dedicate every ounce of your energy into training, and more training.\r\n#L0# #b...um... when are you going to mold me into the Master of my own right?
Huh? Who are you? I don't think you're from here.\r\n#L0# #bHey, I'm the one that told you I want to become the Master! I even defeated 10 #o5120503#s!
Ahhh, I see. I guess something like that occurred before. Anyway, do you still want to become the Master?
Then head over to the training ground immediately and defeat #r20 #o5120503#s#k. What are you waiting for? Hesitation cannot be tolerated in here!
If you don't desire to become the master, then don't interrupt my training. In order to become the Master, one requires to train diligently for a long time.
Hmm... did you really defeat 20 #o5120503#s? You must be a little better than I thought.
Well, but that's nothing. You can't call yourself the Master just by doing that.
You can't even get #r20 #o5120503#s#k. How can you call yourself the Master if you can't even do that?
